name: Splodey
description:
Splodey is a little game where you fight against freinds in local pvp, trying to blow each other up! Heavily inspired by Sagittarius by George Prosser, so I'd definitely recommend checking him out at https://gprosser.itch.io/

I'm part of PenWing Studios, a small collaboration between me (the programmer), Separate_Shelter (the composer), who made the background music, and salty_bac0n (the artist), who will be working on future art-heavy games. More people might be helping later, so look out for their names showing up!

We hope you enjoy this first little project, and stick around for more in future months (we'll be doing one game a month until 2021).

If you're interested in the code, look at our github repo, and if you want to post any comments, concerns, reviews, or ideas for future games go to our subreddit.
